Tony Gum (amụrụ n'afọ 1995) bụ onye na-ese foto na mba South Africa. A mụrụ Gum na Kwa Langa township na Cape Town, Western Cape Province. Ọ bịdọrọ ọrụ foto ya site na itinye foto onwe ya na Instagram; mgbalị a na-atọ ụtọ mepụtara ngwa ngwa n'ime ọrụ nka ọkachamara. E nyere ya ihe nrite Miami Beach Pulse Prize n'afọ 2017.
